content:
Hey! :wave: Over in the rust-lang/stdsimd repo we'd love to be able to run against a couple of niche platforms to make sure we're as portable as we promise.

I heard we have access to a PowerPC machine for CI? Is that available to any repo in rust-lang? We also have a M1-based Mac too, don't we?
I think those are only cross-compiled, we don't actually run tests on them
Tests are only on tier 1 platforms IIUC
@Joshua Nelson Some tests are run for some tier 2 platforms, sometimes in an emulator like qemu or node (js).
